text: Betty Williams (22 May 1943 - 17 March 2020) was a Northern Irish peace activist. She was born in Belfast. She started the organization "Community of Peace People", who worked toward getting peace in Northern Ireland. In 1976, she was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize, together with Mairead Corrigan, who also co-founded the organization. Williams died on 17 March 2020 in Belfast at the age of 76.E' morta Betty Williams, premio Nobel e ideatrice della Città della Pace ==References== == Other websites == * Nobel Committee information on 1976 Peace Laureates * Short biography * Peace People in Northern Ireland – a socialist position Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nobel Peace Prize winners Category:Activists from Belfast
title: Betty Williams (peace activist)
